channel.title: Resident Evil on PacoChan's Website
channel.description: Recent content in Resident Evil on PacoChan's Website

item.title: Added Resident Evil - Text Adventure
item.description: If you have played and completed Without Escape, you may have seen in the extras section an option called Background where I explain where the idea of making the game initially came from.

item.title: Resident Evil - Text Adventure
item.description: If you have played and completed Without Escape, you may have seen in the extras section an option called Background where I explain where the idea of making the game initially came from.

item.title: RE GC Background Extractor
item.description: This program can find and extract the room backgrounds from Resident Evil Remake and Resident Evil Zero for GameCube.

item.title: RECV Editor
item.description: Tool to extract and edit texts and other localizable data from Resident Evil: Code Veronica for PlayStation 2, GameCube and Dreamcast.

item.title: Resident Evil (GameBoy Color)
item.description: Resident Evil for GameBoy Color was cancelled at 90% of development and never released. But thanks to a fundraiser, the one that was holding two builds of this game, released them to the public.
